mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (email, book_number, book_title, sale_price, original_price, img) VALUES (#{email}, #{book_number}, #{book_title}, #{sale_price}, #{original_price}, #{img})
mapper.select: SELECT cart_code, email, book_number, book_title, sale_price, original_price, img FROM cart WHERE email = #{email} ORDER BY cart_code DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart WHERE cart_code = #{cart_code} AND email = #{email}
